alert.note: Alert for Kent (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 9:16PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Kent, northeastern Talbot, central Queen Anne`s and northern Caroline Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 916 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Starr, or near Centerville, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dover, Centerville, Milford, Centreville, Harrington, Camden, Greensboro, Oakland, Ridgely, Bowers, Goldsboro, Queen Anne, Woodside, Viola, Rising Sun-Lebanon, Starr, Jumptown, Hazlettville, Dover Base Housing and Sandtown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
